title: Ticket #5544: IPV4/IPV6 config macros not well documented
description:
ENABLE_IPV4 and ENABLE_IPV6 are documented in the admin section on running on IVP6, but are not documented in the main configuration section (3.3). Some of the related config macros (e.g., PREFER_OUTBOUND_IPV4, IGNORE_TARGET_PROTOCOL_PREFERENCE) seem to not be documented at all.

We need to make sure all of these macros are correctly documented.
check_ins: 2016-Nov-16 15:35   Check-in [49594]: Gittrac #5544: Added missing IPv4/IPv6 macros to config documentation. (By Kent Wenger )
creator: wenger
